event.name: newmet
event.description: Event indicating change in meteorological data

event.name: prepare
event.description: Start of daily simulation time step

event.name: post
event.description: End of daily simulation time step

variable.name: irr_fasw
variable.description: Irrigation fraction of available soil water (0-1)

variable.name: irr_deficit
variable.description: Water deficit within the critical irrigation soil depth (mm)

fertiliser.Description: The fertiliser module doesn't have any properties. It is required though if you wish to apply fertiliser."

variable.name: flow_water
variable.description: Water flow from each layer - layered(mm)

variable.name: flow_no3
variable.description: N flow out of each layer - layered (kg/ha)

ApsimToSim.sim:
<initsection> <init name="genotypes" array="T"> [foreach stock.StockGenotype as genotype] <element> <field name="name" kind="string"> <val>[genotype.genotypename]</val> </field> <field name="dam_breed" kind="string"> <val>[genotype.dam_breed]</val> </field> <field name="sire_breed" kind="string"> <val>[genotype.sire_breed]</val> </field> <field name="generation" kind="integer4"> <val>[genotype.generation]</val> </field> <field name="srw" kind="double" unit="kg"> <val>[genotype.srw]</val> </field> <field name="conception" kind="double" array="T"> <val>[genotype.conception1]</val> <val>[genotype.conception2]</val> </field> <field name="death_rate" kind="double" unit="/y"> <val>[genotype.death_rate]</val> </field> <field name="ref_fleece_wt" kind="double" unit="kg"> <val>[genotype.ref_fleece_wt]</val> </field> <field name="max_fibre_diam" kind="double" unit="um"> <val>[genotype.max_fibre_diam]</val> </field> <field name="fleece_yield" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[genotype.fleece_yield]</val> </field> <field name="peak_milk" kind="double" unit="kg"> <val>[genotype.peak_milk]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </init>
<init name="cattle" array="T"> [foreach stock.cattle] <element> <field name="name" kind="string"> <val>[cattle.GenotypeName]</val> </field> <field name="number" kind="integer4"> <val>[cattle.number]</val> </field> <field name="sex" kind="string"> <val>[cattle.sex]</val> </field> <field name="age" kind="double"> <val>[cattle.age]</val> </field> <field name="weight" kind="double"> <val>[cattle.weight]</val> </field> <field name="max_prev_wt" kind="double"> <val>[cattle.max_prev_wt]</val> </field> <field name="mated_to" kind="string"> <val>[cattle.mated_to]</val> </field> <field name="pregnant" kind="integer4"> <val>[cattle.pregnant]</val> </field> <field name="lactating" kind="integer4"> <val>[cattle.lactating]</val> </field> <field name="no_foetuses" kind="integer4"> <val>[cattle.no_foetuses]</val> </field> <field name="no_suckling" kind="string"> <val>[cattle.no_suckling]</val> </field> <field name="birth_cs" kind="double"> <val>[cattle.birth_cs]</val> </field> <field name="calf_wt" kind="double"> <val>[cattle.calf_wt]</val> </field> <field name="paddock" kind="string"> <val>[cattle.paddock]</val> </field> <field name="tag" kind="integer4"> <val>[cattle.tag]</val> </field> <field name="priority" kind="integer4"> <val>[cattle.priority]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </init>
<init name="sheep" array="T"> [foreach stock.sheep] <element> <field name="name" kind="string"> <val>[sheep.GenotypeName]</val> </field> <field name="number" kind="integer4"> <val>[sheep.number]</val> </field> <field name="sex" kind="string"> <val>[sheep.sex]</val> </field> <field name="age" kind="double"> <val>[sheep.age]</val> </field> <field name="weight" kind="double"> <val>[sheep.weight]</val> </field> <field name="max_prev_wt" kind="double"> <val>[sheep.max_prev_wt]</val> </field> <field name="fleece_wt" kind="double"> <val>[sheep.fleece_wt]</val> </field> <field name="fibre_diam" kind="double"> <val>[sheep.fibre_diam]</val> </field> <field name="mated_to" kind="string"> <val>[sheep.mated_to]</val> </field> <field name="pregnant" kind="integer4"> <val>[sheep.pregnant]</val> </field> <field name="lactating" kind="integer4"> <val>[sheep.lactating]</val> </field> <field name="no_young" kind="integer4"> <val>[sheep.no_young]</val> </field> <field name="birth_cs" kind="double"> <val>[sheep.birth_cs]</val> </field> <field name="lamb_wt" kind="double"> <val>[sheep.lamb_wt]</val> </field> <field name="lamb_fleece_wt" kind="double"> <val>[sheep.lamb_fleece_wt]</val> </field> <field name="paddock" kind="string"> <val>[sheep.paddock]</val> </field> <field name="tag" kind="integer4"> <val>[sheep.tag]</val> </field> <field name="priority" kind="integer4"> <val>[sheep.priority]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </init>
</initsection>

variable.name: dm_feed_on_offer
variable.description: Dry matter of feed on offer (kg/ha)

ApsimToSim.sim:
[foreach manager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition]
[condition.innerxml]
[endfor] [endfor]

yes [foreach tclmanager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition]
[condition.innerxml] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor]
[endfor] [endfor]

yes [foreach farmmanager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition]
[condition.innerxml] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor]
[endfor] [endfor]

no [foreach paddockmanager.rule as rule] [foreach rule.condition as condition]
[condition.innerxml] [foreach rule.category as category] [category.xml] [endfor]
[endfor] [endfor]

variable.name: surfaceom_wt
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic materials

variable.name: surfaceom_c
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic carbon

variable.name: surfaceom_n
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic nitrogen

variable.name: surfaceom_p
variable.description: Total mass of all surface organic phosphor

variable.name: surfaceom_cover
variable.description: Fraction of ground covered by all surface OM"s

variable.name: surfaceom_wt_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Mass of organic matter named {Enter Pool Name}

variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.description: Mass of organic nitrogen in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: surfaceom_p_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Mass of organic phosphor in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.description: Mass of nitrate in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: surfaceom_nh4_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Mass of ammonium in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: surfaceom_labile_p_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Mass of labile phosphorus in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: surfaceom_c1_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in {Enter Pool Name} in fpool1

variable.name: surfaceom_c2_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in {Enter Pool Name} in fpool2

variable.name: surfaceom_c3_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Mass of organic carbon in {Enter Pool Name} in fpool3

variable.name: surfaceom_n1_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Mass of organic nitrogen in {Enter Pool Name} in fpool1

variable.name: surfaceom_n2_{Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: surfaceom_n3_{Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: pot_c_decomp_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Potential organic C decomposition in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: pot_n_decomp_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Potential organic N decomposition in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: pot_p_decomp_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Potential organic P decomposition in {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: standing_fr_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Fraction of {Enter Pool Name} which is inert, ie not in contact with the ground

variable.name: surfaceom_cover_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: Fraction of ground covered by {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: cnrf_{Enter Pool Name}
variable.description: C:N ratio factor for decomposition for {Enter Pool Name}

variable.name: vpd_estimation
variable.description: vpd_estimation: What Grasp used for daily VPD

variable.name: growth_transp
variable.description: growth_transp: Potential growth by mass flow

variable.name: death_water
variable.description: death_water; Leaf death by water stress

variable.name: death_water_stem
variable.description: death_w_stem: Stem death by water stress

broccoli.Description: NOTE: Prototype only. This module is not to be used in model applications. Most APSIM crop or plant modules do not require extra user input. Crop specific parameters are either provided for your chosen soil, or are captured as part of the standard model validation process.

variable.name: wso
variable.description: Dry weight of storage organs kg/ha

variable.name: wlvg
variable.description: Dry weight of green leaves kg/ha

variable.name: wlvd
variable.description: Dry weight of dead leaves kg/ha

variable.name: hu
variable.description: Daily heat units effective for phenological development (oCd d-1)

variable.name: lrstrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor causing leaf rolling

variable.name: ldstrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor accelerating leaf death !-

variable.name: lestrs
variable.description: Drought stress factor reducing leaf expansion !-

variable.name: pcew
variable.description: Effect of drought stress on daily total gross CO2 assimilation of crop; reduction in potential transpiration rate !-

variable.name: tnsoil
variable.description: Daily amount of N available for uptake from soil !kg N ha-1 d-1

variable.name: nflv
variable.description: Nitrogen fraction in leaves on leaf area basis !g N m-2 leaf

variable.name: fnlv
variable.description: Fraction of N in leaves on weight basis !kg N kg-1 DM

variable.name: nacr
variable.description: Actual nitrogen uptake rate by crop !kg N ha-1 d-1

variable.name: ancr
variable.description: Amount of N in crop (live and dead material) !kg N ha-1

variable.name: anso
variable.description: Amount of N in storage organs !kg N ha-1

variable.name: anlv
variable.description: Amount of N in leaves !kg N ha-1

variable.name: rnstrs
variable.description: Reduction factor on relative leaf growth rate caused by N stress !-

variable.name: dtga
variable.description: Daily total gross CO2 assimilation of crop !kg CO2 ha-1 d-1

variable.name: gcr
variable.description: Gross growth rate of crop !kg DM ha-1 d-1

variable.name: ssga
variable.description: Specific green stem area !ha stem kg-1 stem

variable.name: eff
variable.description: Initial light-use efficiency (kg CO2 ha-1 leaf h-1)(W m-2 leaf )-1

variable.name: etrd
variable.description: Radiation-driven part of reference evapotranspiration rate !mm d-1

variable.name: etae
variable.description: Dryness-driven part of reference evapotranspiration rate !mm d-1

variable.name: trc
variable.description: Potential transpiration rate of crop with given LAI !mm d-1

variable.name: swdef_expan

variable.name: ep
variable.description: Sugar daily crop water uptake, Ep (mm)

variable.description: E. grandis Live Above-ground Biomass Pools

variable.name: adm_dead

variable.name: adm_sen
variable.description: E. grandis Senesced Above-ground Biomass Pools

climatechange.Description: This component allows the user to apply modifiers to daily climate variables in order to investigate the effects of climate change.

sim.rule: !change met data to reflect climate change met.maxt = met.maxt + [climatechange.maxtmodifier] met.mint = met.mint + [climatechange.mintmodifier] met.rain = met.rain * [climatechange.rainmodifier] met.radn = met.radn * [climatechange.radiationmodifier]

soi.Description: This component allows the user to add SOI phases to a simulation. These phases can then be used in manager logic.

ApsimToSim.sim: <initsection> <init name="published_events" array="T"> </init> <init name="driver_connections" array="T"> </init> <init name="param_file" kind="string"> <val></val> </init> <init name="species" kind="string"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.species]</val> </init> <init name="nutrients" kind="string"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.nutrients]</val> </init> <init name="fertility" kind="double"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.fertility]</val> </init> <init name="layers" kind="double" array="T" unit="mm"> </init> <init name="max_rtdep" kind="double" unit="mm"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.max_rtdep]</val> </init> <init name="lagged_day_t" kind="double" unit="oC"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.lagged_day_t]</val> </init> <init name="phenology" kind="double"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.phenology]</val> </init> <init name="flower_len" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.flower_len]</val> </init> <init name="flower_time" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.flower_time]</val> </init> <init name="senc_index" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.senc_index]</val> </init> <init name="dorm_index" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.dorm_index]</val> </init> <init name="dorm_t" kind="double" unit="oC"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.dorm_t]</val> </init> <init name="extinct_coeff" kind="double" array="T"> <val>0.0</val> <val>0.5</val> <val>0.0</val> </init> <init name="green" array="T"> [foreach FarmwisePasture.FarmwisePastureGreen as Green] <element> <field name="status" kind="string"> <val>[Green.status]</val> </field> <field name="herbage" array="T"> [foreach Green.FarmwisePastureGreenHerbage as Herbage] <element> <field name="dmd" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.dmd]</val> </field> <field name="weight" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Herbage.weight]</val> </field> <field name="n_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.n_conc]</val> </field> <field name="p_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.p_conc]</val> </field> <field name="s_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.s_conc]</val> </field> <field name="spec_area" kind="double" array="T" unit="cm^2/g"> <val>[Herbage.spec_area]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </field> <field name="root_wt" array="T"> [foreach Green.FarmwisePastureGreenHerbage as Herbage] <element kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Herbage.root_wt]</val> </element> [endfor] </field> <field name="rt_dep" kind="double" unit="mm"> <val>[Green.rt_dep]</val> </field> <field name="estab_index" kind="double"> <val>[Green.estab_index]</val> </field> <field name="stress_index" kind="double"> <val>[Green.stress_index]</val> </field> <field name="stem_reloc" kind="double" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Green.stem_reloc]</val> </field> <field name="frosts" kind="integer4"> <val>[Green.frosts]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </init> <init name="dry" array="T"> [foreach FarmwisePasture.FarmwisePastureDry as Dry] <element> <field name="status" kind="string"> <val>[Dry.status]</val> </field> <field name="herbage" array="T"> [foreach Dry.FarmwisePastureDryHerbage as Herbage] <element> <field name="dmd" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.dmd]</val> </field> <field name="weight" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Herbage.weight]</val> </field> <field name="n_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.n_conc]</val> </field> <field name="p_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.p_conc]</val> </field> <field name="s_conc" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[Herbage.s_conc]</val> </field> <field name="spec_area" kind="double" array="T" unit="cm^2/g"> <val>[Herbage.spec_area]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </field> </element> [endfor] </init> [foreach FarmwisePasture.FarmwisePastureSeeds as Seeds] <init name="seeds"> <field name="soft_unripe" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Seeds.soft_unripe]</val> </field> <field name="soft_ripe" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Seeds.soft_ripe]</val> </field> <field name="hard_unripe" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Seeds.hard_unripe]</val> </field> <field name="hard_ripe" kind="double" array="T" unit="kg/ha"> <val>[Seeds.hard_ripe]</val> </field> </init> [endfor] <init name="seed_dorm_time" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.seed_dorm_time]</val> </init> <init name="germ_index" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[FarmwisePasture.germ_index]</val> </init> </initsection>

<init name="spoilage_time" kind="double" unit="d"> <val>[spoilage_time]</val> </init> <init name="stores" array="T"> [foreach supplement.supplementStore as store] <element> <field name="name" kind="string"> <val>[store.name]</val> </field> <field name="stored" kind="double" unit="kg"> <val>[store.stored]</val> </field> <field name="roughage" kind="boolean"> <val>[store.roughage]</val> </field> <field name="dm_content" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[store.dm_content]</val> </field> <field name="dmd" kind="double"> <val>[store.dmd]</val> </field> <field name="me_content" kind="double" unit="MJ/kg"> <val>[store.me_content]</val> </field> <field name="cp_conc" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[store.cp_conc]</val> </field> <field name="prot_dg" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[store.prot_dg]</val> </field> <field name="p_conc" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[store.p_conc]</val> </field> <field name="s_conc" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[store.s_conc]</val> </field> <field name="ee_conc" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[store.ee_conc]</val> </field> <field name="adip2cp" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[store.adip2cp]</val> </field> <field name="ash_alk" kind="double" unit="mol/kg"> <val>[store.ash_alk]</val> </field> <field name="max_passage" kind="double" unit="kg/kg"> <val>[store.max_passage]</val> </field> </element> [endfor] </init> </initsection>

variable.name: final_soil_temp_surface
variable.description: Soil surface temperature at the end of the final internal Soiltemp timestep. (oC)

variable.name: final_soil_temp
variable.description: Soil temperature at the end of the final internal Soiltemp timestep. oC

variable.name: ave_soil_temp_surface
variable.description: Average soil surface temperature during the Apsim timestep. (oC)

variable.name: ave_soil_temp
variable.description: Average soil surface temperature during the Apsim timestep. (oC)

variable.name: mint_soil_surface
variable.description: Minimum soil surface temperature found on surface during the Apsim timestep. (oC)

variable.name: mint_soil
variable.description: Minimum soil surface temperature found in each layer during the Apsim timestep. (oC)

variable.name: maxt_soil_surface
variable.description: Maximum soil surface temperature found on surface during the Apsim timestep. (oC)

variable.name: maxt_soil
variable.description: Maximum soil surface temperature found in each layer during the Apsim timestep. (oC)

variable.name: therm_cond
variable.description: Thermal conductivity for each layer. (J s-1 m-1 K-1)

variable.name: heat_store
variable.description: Volumetric specific heat for each layer. (J m-3 K-1)
